DOC.brief_summary: Background objective : Plasma cobalamins decrease pregnancy fully elucidate reflected total cobalamin saturate transport protein , transcobalamin ( total TC , holoTC ) haptocorrin ( total HC , holoHC ) . TC transport cobalamin cell . The function HC unknown , contrast TC bind cobalamin cobalamin analogue . Design method : Healthy pregnant woman ( N=141 ) blood sample draw 18th , 32nd , 39th gestation week 8 week postpartum . The protein moiety TC HC ( total holo ) measure in-house ELISA method .
DOC.detailed_description: Background objective : Plasma cobalamins decrease pregnancy fully elucidate reflected total cobalamin saturate transport protein , transcobalamin ( total TC , holoTC ) haptocorrin ( total HC , holoHC ) . TC transport cobalamin cell . The function HC unknown , contrast TC bind cobalamin cobalamin analogue . Design method : Healthy pregnant woman ( N=141 ) blood sample draw 18th , 32nd , 39th gestation week 8 week postpartum . The protein moiety TC HC ( total holo ) measure in-house ELISA method .
DOC.criteria: Danish healthy Caucasian woman > 18 year age previous uncomplicated pregnancy deliveries presently normal pregnancy . > 4 cigarette smoke per day , Treatment vitamin B12 , folic acid acetyl salicylic acid , Impaired renal function clinically significant vaginal haemorrhage first visit well blood haemoglobin < 6.4 mmol/L first visit .
